overview: Scarlett Sage finds a magical diary in the garage and realizes she can get whatever she wants by writing it down. By spelling out her desires she gets her stepmom, Syren De Mer, the way she's always wanted. Mindi Mink joins a knitting club and asks her daughter, Jenna Foxx, to tag along. When they witness mother and daughter Alexis Fawx and Alex Grey making out, it's inevitable that they all join in on the fun. Sarah is reading her step daughter Cadence Lux a bedtime story, but when she gets scared, it's up to Sarah to make her feel better.
title: No More Fairy Tales
